name: ebook-landing-page
description: Landing page para download de e-book

scripts.deploy:static: aws s3 sync src/ s3://$(grep 's3Bucket:' serverless.yml | awk '{print $2}')/ --delete
scripts.invalidate-cache: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudfront list-distributions --query "DistributionList.Items[?Aliases.Items[0]=='$(grep 's3Bucket:' serverless.yml | awk '{print $2}')"].Id" --output text) --paths "/*"
